scripts.bundle-vendor-js: cat ./node_modules/vue/dist/vue.min.js ./node_modules/tether/dist/js/tether.min.js ./node_modules/tether-shepherd/dist/js/shepherd.min.js vendor.bundle.js > vendor.tmp.js && cat vendor.tmp.js > vendor.bundle.js
scripts.bundle-vendor-js-debug: cat ./node_modules/vue/dist/vue.js ./node_modules/clipboard/dist/clipboard.js ./node_modules/tether/dist/js/tether.js ./node_modules/tether-shepherd/dist/js/shepherd.js vendor.bundle.js > vendor.tmp.js && cat vendor.tmp.js > vendor.bundle.js
scripts.clean: rm -f vendor.bundle.js vendor.bundle.css index.bundle.js index.bundle.css index.js index.js.map vendor.js vendor.js.map vendor.bundle.js app.html vendor.tmp.js
scripts.build: npm run bundle-vendor-css && npm run bundle-index-css && tsc && npm run minifier-template && webpack --display-modules && npm run bundle-vendor-js && npm run rev && npm run clean
scripts.build-debug: npm run bundle-vendor-css-debug && npm run bundle-index-css-debug && tsc && npm run minifier-template-debug && webpack --display-modules --config webpack.config.debug.js && npm run bundle-vendor-js-debug && npm run rev && npm run clean
